newsitem.title: USA: Fla. $57 mln power bonds apparently won by Goldman.
newsitem.headline: Fla. $57 mln power bonds apparently won by Goldman.

text.p: Goldman, Sachs & Co said Wednesday it appears to have won $57.2 million Florida Municipal Power Agency bonds at a true interest cost of 5.447 percent. The firm said it is awaiting confirmation of its award.
